desc: Diamond Mind Baseball is a PC based simulation game that's been around for more than 25 years and is considered the best baseball simulator out there!

layout.text:
We are very excited to announce that version 12 is now available!
Along with many other improvements, Diamond Mind Baseball: Version 12 includes full support
for all of the latest MLB rule changes so that you can continue to enjoy the most realistic
strategy-oriented baseball game with seasons from the past, present and into the future.
